content: To classify the technologies, I will use the `classify_risks` function provided. This function requires an array of risks, each with a name and a category. I will map the provided technologies to the `name` property and ask for the appropriate classification for each. Let's start by classifying the technologies one by one.

function_call.name: classify_risks
